commit message:
invalid new line character.. replaced \r\n by \n
added apk
moved android application to a separate folder
added wifi and cell db builder (python scripts)
Changed build target to Android-10 instead of Google-APIs;
Added AGPL reference to credits screen
Fixed layout issue on main screen (http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=2)
Fixed a crash in CellExporter when session has no cells
Refactored StaleVersionChecker to use AsyncTask (to prevent android.os.NetworkOnMainThreadException)
Changed overlay refresh distance (http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=5) for better user experience
Refactored map and wifi catalog download to use http://developer.android.com/reference/android/app/DownloadManager.html
use Android Download Manager instead of home-brew downloader
addressed memory leaks in gpx exporter

Map overlay update  trigger changed (interval+position change), added fail-safe zoom (http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=12) and a simple data prefetch mechanism for smoother overlay object display

Addressing http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=8
- Added a simple upload retry mechanism on failed upload
- Fixed NPE in FileUploader.java
More intelligent approach for online check: don't check/load complete main openbmap.org website, but check current_version.xml only

Fixing http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=15
Added second version attribute to xml files (now SW_VERSION tracking + SW_VERSION export)
Bumped to 00.7.01

added python script to fix lat/lon bug in 00.6.00, 00.6.01, 00.6.02
(will be applied on server-side)
Ask for confirmation when deleting session (http://code.google.com/p/openbmap/issues/detail?id=16)
